subHeroDesc: A leading company in the production, manufacturing, and distribution of yerba mate across Syria and the Arab world. It operates factories in both Argentina and Syria, follows the highest hygiene standards, and uses advanced technology to produce the finest quality beverage.
mateArriveTitle: How does yerba mate reach you?
mateArriveDesc: Yerba mate goes through a long series of stages — from its cultivation and harvesting to its delivery to the consumer — resulting in the final product that makes the best drink.

argentina.alt: Kabour International Group – Our Factory in Syria
argentina.title: Kabour International Group – Our Factory in Syria
argentina.desc: Kabour International Group is a family-owned company began its journey in 1960 as the first importer and specialist in importing yerba mate from Argentina to the Syrian market. With decades of experience and a solid reputation, Kabour became widely known for selecting the finest types of yerba mate, catering to diverse consumer tastes. Through this longstanding expertise, the company earned the trust of international suppliers and solidified its position as a leading name in the yerba mate sector in Syria. We have secured official agencies and packing licenses in Syria from leading brands such as Piporí and Taragüi. In 1985 the factory has been established for preparing and packaging yerba mate In Syria (Yabroud – Rural Damascus). This specialization has led to the creation of our own brand, Khareta Al khadra, which has become a symbol of quality and trust in the market.

syria.alt: Grupo Kabour – Our Factory in Argentina
syria.title: Grupo Kabour – Our Factory in Argentina
syria.desc: In 2007 the company started to expand the strategic business and established a big factory in Argentina with our own farms for planting yerba mate, drying, blending then exporting to Syria and packaging according to each kind. It is now one of the leading companies in Argentina which keep the best quality with suitable prices for the exported Yerba Mate to Syria.

campo.title: Campo Company
campo.desc: Meanwhile, Campo Company expanded its operations to offer a broad range of products. It entered the field of importing and packing black tea, followed by the establishment of a dedicated facility for green tea, herbal blends, and medicinal infusions. Campo's commitment to scientific research and high-quality standards has made its herbal and wellness products reliable and effective. As part of its growth, Campo also launched a line of roasted coffee packed in vacuum-sealed bags and built a state-of-the-art coffee processing facility equipped with advanced machinery. The company further extended its portfolio to include instant hot drinks and powdered milk, providing a rich and diverse selection to meet the needs of Syrian consumers. This clear distinction—Kabour as the expert in yerba mate and Campo as the innovator behind a wider beverage range—reflects a well-integrated strategy that combines specialization with innovation, always aiming to deliver the highest quality in every product category.

quality.title: Professional Yerba Mate Tasting Sessions
quality.desc: Our tasting sessions are a fundamental part of the product development process for our yerba mate. We gather a team of experts and specialists, along with a group of interested customers, to taste and discuss various new and improved blends to refine products according to their preferences

laboratories.title: Advanced Modern Machinery in Our Facility – A Quantum Leap in Production Quality
laboratories.desc: We take pride in utilizing the latest advanced technologies and equipment in our facility, ensuring the highest levels of hygiene and precision at every step of production. Our production lines are fully automated, meaning products never come into contact with workers' hands during preparation and packaging stages. This greatly reduces contamination risks and guarantees the safety and quality of the final product. With these advanced technologies, we are committed to delivering products that meet the highest standards of quality and safety.

centerDesc: Our company boasts an extensive network of distribution centers spread across all Syrian governorates, enabling us to efficiently and swiftly meet the demands of local markets.

1.name: kaharta
1.desc: We have long-standing expertise in yerba mate packaging, This specialization has led to the creation of our own brand, Kharta Al khadra, which has become a symbol of quality and trust in the market.

2.name: Pipore
2.desc: We are an agent and representative for Pipore brand, one of the leading imported yerba mate labels in the Syrian market, known for its high quality and diverse blends. our strong relationships with suppliers and partners in Argentina led to have secured the official rights to package and distribute this brand in Syria, a testament to the trust our international partners place in our expertise and capabilities.

3.name: Taragui
3.desc: We are honoured to hold the exclusive license for the Taragüi brand, one of the most renowned yerba mate names worldwide. This partnership reflects global recognition of our expertise and market presence, granting us the official rights to package and distribute Taragüi products in Syria, while maintaining the original quality under the direct supervision of the parent company.

desc: The beverage Zhurat considered as the best which protects against colds, flu and cough that increases during the cold weather.
In addition to that, it also helps to expel toxins from the body, it strengthens the immune system, And also relieves headaches, And removes bloating and helps in the process of digestion.
usageInstructions: To Preserve the whole delicate flavor, put a bag of campo (Natural Zhourat) in a 250 ml cup, then pour boiling water and leave it for 3 minutes.
If you want a stronger taste, leave the bag in the water for 4 minutes.

33.name: Campo immune support mixture
33.desc: An auxiliary medical mixture that supports the immune system because it contains green tea as a powerful antioxidant, which helps to protect the cells of the body from oxidation and damage. It also contains Milk thistle, which helps maintain the health of the liver, and it contains chamomile, ginger and mint which helps maintain the health of the digestive system. the herbs that make up the mixture are rich in vitamin C and minerals that support the health of the immune system.

desc: We proudly present high-quality natural herbal medicinal blends, carefully prepared and packed in tea bags, each individually sealed within a special envelope to preserve the freshness of flavor and maintain the therapeutic properties of the herbs.These blends are designed to effectively assist in relieving various pains and improving overall health, using carefully selected natural ingredients, based on the latest scientific research, and supervised by our scientific team and a qualified pharmacist.

Each box of our blends contains an approved medical prescription (Inner Leaflet) certified by the Syrian Ministry of Health. This is the result of extensive research and efforts by our scientific team, under the supervision of a licensed pharmacist, ensuring the highest standards of quality and safety.

studyData.desc: Yerba mate contains natural compounds that boost energy and focus, while also supporting the immune system and fighting inflammation
Many studies have shown that yerba mate helps improve digestion, reduce joint inflammation, and regulate blood sugar levels.
Yerba mate tea offers a natural stimulant effect without causing stress, making it an excellent coffee alternative with additional health benefits such as improving cardiovascular health
Yerba mate is rich in antioxidants that combat aging and improve brain function, while also boosting metabolism and aiding in weight loss.

phase1.title: Kbour International Farms
phase1.desc: The lands of Kbour International Group are located in the north of the Misiones region in Argentina, near the town of Comandante Andresito.

phase2.title: Harvesting Yerba Mate
phase2.desc: The harvested yerba mate leaves are dried in several stages to achieve low moisture content, preserving their quality and properties.

phase3.title: Sapeco Process
phase3.desc: Green leaves enter the Sapeco unit where they are exposed to high heat (up to 400°C) for one minute to stop fermentation enzymes.

phase4.title: Preseco Process
phase4.desc: In this stage, the leaves go through a process similar to Sapeco but with 30% less heat.

phase5.title: Cinta 1 & 2
phase5.desc: After Preseco, yerba mate passes through Cinta chambers at 80–100°C for 10 hours to dry the leaves and stems completely.

phase6.title: Canchadora and noke
phase6.desc: Leaves enter Canchadora and are coarsely cut into 'kenchada'. Then, stems are separated from leaves in Nuki and stored for a year in aging warehouses.

phase7.title: Warehouses
phase7.desc: After drying, yerba mate is stored in aging warehouses for one year.

phase8.title: Milling
phase8.desc: After aging, the dried yerba mate is milled and packaged.

phase9.title: Packaging & Shipping
phase9.desc: Yerba Mate is shipped by sea to Syria, going through several stages before reaching the consumer.

phase11.title: Container Arrival
phase11.desc: Bulk yerba mate bags arrive at the warehouse inside sealed metal containers.

phase12.title: Sorting Yerba Mate
phase12.desc: Yerba Mate is packed into moisture- and odor-resistant paper containers. The packaging is fully automated without human contact, following all hygiene standards.

phase13.title: Packaging
phase13.desc: Yerba Mate is packed into moisture- and odor-resistant paper containers. The packaging is fully automated without human contact, following all hygiene standards.

phase1.desc: A yerba mate processing and packaging factory was established in Syria - Yabroud area.

phase2.desc: A facility for packaging various types of imported tea from Sri Lanka, India, China, and Kenya was established.

phase3.desc: Preparations were made to launch a strategic project in Argentina for growing, drying, milling, and exporting yerba mate to Syria. It is now one of the leading companies in Argentina.

phase4.desc: In 2009, Kbour International Group started producing and packaging medicinal herbs under the brand name 'Campo' after sterilization and purification.

phase5.desc: Our product line expanded in 2012 to include various types of instant hot drinks (powders).

phase6.desc: In 2016, our product line expanded to include licensed medical mixtures approved by the Syrian Ministry of Health. These mixtures were developed under scientific supervision using numerous medical references.

phase7.desc: Coffee was added to Kbour Company's product family in 2021.

MateBenifit.1: Boosts the immune system in general
MateBenifit.3: High content of antioxidants — even more than green tea — as well as stimulants and nutrients
MateBenifit.5: Enhances metabolism, thus supporting weight loss
MateBenifit.6: May help protect against heart diseases
MateBenifit.7: May help prevent infections from fungi, parasites, and bacteria
MateBenifit.8: Boosts energy, improves focus, and enhances alertness
MateBenifit.9: Contains almost all the vitamins, minerals, and amino acids the human body needs

exportDesc: We are also is one of the leading exporters of packaged yerba mate to various parts of the world. We possess extensive experience in meeting the demands of international markets with high quality.
